#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
typedef char bool;
#define true  1
#define false 1

int get_array(const int * d, const int x){
	return ((d [ x/32] >> (x % 32))  & 1);
}
void set_array(int * d, const int x){
	d [ x/32] |= (1 << (x%32));//(((d [ x/8] >> (x % 8))  | 1) << (x %8));
}

int main(int argc, char** argv)
{
	int N, X, Y, i, j;
	
	scanf("%d%d%d", &N, &X, &Y);
	
	int* a = (int*)calloc(N + 10, sizeof(int));
	for (i = 0; i < N; i++)
	{
		scanf("%d", &a[i]);
		a[i]--;
	}
	
	int W = Y - X;
	if (W < 0) W = 0;
	int* d = (int*)calloc(W/32 + 10, sizeof(int));
	//d[0] = true;
	set_array(d, 0);
	for (i = 0; i < N && !d[W]; i++)
		for (j = a[i]; j <= W; j++){
			//const bool temp = d[(j - a[i])/ 8] >> ((j - a[i]) %8);
			//d[j] |= (temp && 1) << ((j-a[i]) % 8);
			if (get_array(d, j - a[i]))
				set_array(d, j);
			//d[j] |= d[j - a[i]];
			
			}
	if (get_array(d, W)) printf("POSSIBLE\n");
	else printf("IMPOSSIBLE\n");
	free(a); free(d);
	return 0;
}
